Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Pistons are huge favorites to win.
Jaden Ivey, the No. 5 pick from the 2022 Draft, scored 17 points against the Nuggets and added another 22 against the Magic to lead his team in both games.
Miles Bridges scored 31 points, including a 3-pointer with 2 seconds left to send the game into overtime.
The Pistons returned to winning ways with a 105-96 victory after dropping a game against Denver Nuggets to close out 2024.
With ten minutes to go against Orlando Magic, Cole Anthony slipped and fell on Ivey’s leg while going for the ball and broke the 22-year-old’s leg.
